	Promote and sell financial products to individuals & small businesses.
	Build lasting relationships with customers in your area.

Senior Accountant Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant

Job Location: Shagamu, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a Senior Accountant to join our finance team.
	The ideal candidate will bring solid accounting expertise, strong knowledge of compliance, and the ability to deliver accurate financial reporting.
	You’ll manage core accounting functions, support audits, and provide insights that help drive business performance.


Responsibilities


	Handle general ledger, reconciliations, and month/quarter/year-end close.
	Prepare and review financial statements
	Ensure tax filings, audits, and regulatory compliance.
	Conduct variance analysis and support business decisions.
	Enhance accounting processes and guide junior team members.


Qualification


	Bachelor’s in Accounting/Finance
	Experience: 3-5years
	Ican Certification is an added advantage
	Proficiency in accounting systems (SAP/Oracle/QuickBooks/Tally).
	Advanced Excel skills, with an eye for detail and accuracy.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruiter9@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as subject of the mail.
